mapper.insert: insert into user (email, password, user_name, birth, phone_number, user_type, banned, img_path) values (#{email}, #{password}, #{user_name}, #{birth}, #{phone_number}, #{user_type}, #{banned}, #{img_path})
mapper.select: select * from article where pk_article in (select article_no from alike where user_no = #{pk_user} and bookmark = true)
